locale-select.settings.googleMaps.title: Google Maps Configuration
locale-select.settings.googleMaps.apiKey: Enter your Google Maps API key with Places API enabled
locale-select.settings.googleMaps.help.t: How to get a Google Maps API Key
locale-select.settings.googleMaps.help.d: To use the address autocomplete feature, you need a Google Maps API key with the Places API enabled:
locale-select.settings.googleMaps.help.s: Go to the Google Cloud Console
Create a new project or select an existing one
Enable the Google Maps Places API
Create an API key and copy it here
